Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Artistic \Ar*tis"tic\, Artistical \Ar*tis"tic*al\, a. [Cf. F. artistique, fr. artiste.] Of or pertaining to art or to artists; made in the manner of an artist; conformable to art; characterized by art; showing taste or skill. -- {Ar*tis"tic*al*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]

artistic adj 1: relating to or characteristic of art or artists; "his artistic background" 2: satisfying aesthetic standards and sensibilities; "artistic workmanship" 3: aesthetically pleasing; "an artistic flower arrangement" [syn: {aesthetic}, {esthetic}, {pleasing}]
